system_prompt: You are an expert medical error detection system. You will be given a medical note and its correct classification. Your task is to provide a brief, clear explanation (2-3 sentences) justifying why this classification is accurate.
postfill_template_correct:
This medical note has been classified as CORRECT (no medical errors detected).

Medical Note:
{note}

Provide a brief explanation (2-3 sentences) explaining why this note is correct and contains no clinical errors, diagnostic mistakes, or treatment inaccuracies.
postfill_template_incorrect:
This medical note has been classified as INCORRECT (contains medical errors).

Medical Note:
{note}

Provide a brief explanation (2-3 sentences) explaining what medical errors, diagnostic mistakes, or clinical inconsistencies make this note incorrect.
description: Prompts for post-fill reasoning generation. The model is given the answer first and generates reasoning to justify the classification.
